last_episode_to_air.name: I Forgot to Live (Me olvidé de vivir)
last_episode_to_air.overview: After stepping back from coaching Argentina’s national team, Bilardo continues to impart his knowledge around the world.

name: Bilardo, the Soccer Doctor
overview: A revealing and intimate docuseries chronicling the life and career of Argentine national soccer team coach Dr. Carlos Bilardo through insights from family, friends, former players, and rivals.

episodes.name: The Most Hated Man (El hombre más odiado)
episodes.overview: After taking control of Argentina’s national soccer team, Coach Carlos Bilardo becomes the target of criticism from players, staff, and frustrated fans. Meanwhile, an untested Diego Maradona faces a rocky road to the World Cup.

episodes.name: Sorry, Bilardo (Perdón, Bilardo)
episodes.overview: After qualifying for the 1986 World Cup, Bilardo’s path towards victory is complicated by training challenges, bad press, and a government plot to replace him. In Mexico, Argentina finally gets the chance to prove themselves on the pitch.

episodes.name: One More Adventure (Un'avventura in più)
episodes.overview: After a successful run in Mexico, Bilardo immediately sets his sights on the next World Cup, pushing both his players – and his family – to the limit.

episodes.name: I Forgot to Live (Me olvidé de vivir)
episodes.overview: After stepping back from coaching Argentina’s national team, Bilardo continues to impart his knowledge around the world.
